scene_description_enriched: The image depicts Christ seated on a throne, with arms outstretched. He wears a blue mantle over a bare chest, revealing wounds on his side and hands. A golden star-shaped clasp adorns his chest. His halo is golden with black accents. He is seated on a rainbow, with his feet resting on golden sun and moon symbols. The background is a red tapestry with a gold geometric pattern and white floral motifs. The scene is framed by a blue and gold border.
